statements: SELECT * FROM employee_authentication WHERE id = 1
SELECT employee_id, fingerprint_scan FROM employee_authentication WHERE employee_id = 100 ORDER BY date_scanned DESC
SELECT id, fingerprint_scan, date_scanned FROM employee_authentication WHERE id IN (2, 3, 5)
SELECT * FROM employee_authentication ORDER BY employee_id ASC, date_scanned DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_count FROM employee_authentication WHERE fingerprint_scan IS NOT NULL
SELECT * FROM employee_authentication WHERE employee_id = 100;
SELECT id, fingerprint_scan FROM employee_authentication WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM employee_authentication WHERE date_scanned > '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT employee_id, fingerprint_scan FROM employee_authentication WHERE fingerprint_scan LIKE '%John%';
SELECT * FROM employee_authentication ORDER BY date_scanned DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM employee_authentications;
SELECT employee_id, access_level FROM employee_authentications WHERE access_level > 3;
SELECT employee_id, scan_datetime FROM access_logs ORDER BY scan_datetime DESC;
SELECT * FROM employee_authentications WHERE employee_id = 1001;
SELECT employee_id, access_level FROM employee_authentications WHERE access_level < 2;
SELECT * FROM employee_authentications WHERE access_level > 3;
SELECT employee_id, access_level FROM employee_authentications ORDER BY access_level DESC;
SELECT employee_id FROM employee_authentications WHERE fingerprint_scan IS NOT NULL;
SELECT employee_id, scan_datetime FROM access_logs WHERE success = true ORDER BY scan_datetime DESC;
SELECT * FROM employee_authentications JOIN access_logs ON employee_authentications.employee_id = access_logs.employee_id WHERE access_level < 5 AND success = true;
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT name, id FROM employees WHERE id = 1;
SELECT dept_name FROM departments ORDER BY dept_name DESC;
SELECT login_time, employee_id FROM employee_logins WHERE login_id >= 100 ORDER BY login_time ASC;
SELECT id, name, fingerprint_scan FROM employees WHERE id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name FROM employees WHERE id = 2;
SELECT dept_name FROM departments ORDER BY dept_id DESC;
SELECT employee_id, login_time FROM employee_logins WHERE login_time >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY login_time ASC;
SELECT id, name FROM employees JOIN departments ON employees.id = departments.dept_id;
SELECT * FROM employee_auth;
SELECT id, last_name, first_name, fingerprint_scan FROM employee_auth;
SELECT employee_id, access_timestamp, access_result FROM employee_access_logs ORDER BY access_timestamp DESC;
SELECT role_name, role_description FROM employee_roles WHERE employee_id = 123;
SELECT scan_id, employee_id, scan_timestamp FROM fingerprint_scans WHERE scan_timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM employee_auth ORDER BY first_name DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, fingerprint_scan FROM employee_auth WHERE last_name='Doe';
SELECT employee_id, access_timestamp FROM employee_access_logs WHERE access_result='SUCCESS' ORDER BY access_timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT role_name, role_description FROM employee_roles INNER JOIN employee_auth ON employee_roles.employee_id = employee_auth.id WHERE role_name='Manager';
SELECT employee_id, fingerprint_data FROM fingerprint_scans WHERE scan_timestamp BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, access_level FROM employees WHERE access_level = 'Admin';
SELECT employee_id, scan_date FROM fingerprint_scans WHERE scan_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM access_logs WHERE success = true ORDER BY access_time DESC;
SELECT dept_name FROM departments ORDER BY dept_name ASC;
SELECT name, access_level FROM employees WHERE id = 1
SELECT * FROM fingerprint_scans ORDER BY scan_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT employee_id, access_time FROM access_logs WHERE success = TRUE ORDER BY access_time ASC
SELECT e.name, d.dept_name FROM employees e JOIN departments d ON e.id = d.dept_id
SELECT u.username, u.password FROM users u WHERE u.user_id IN (1, 2, 3)
